name: n8n-nodes-base.koBoToolbox
semantic_context: Work with KoBoToolbox forms and submissions

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.ai_hint: Form ID (e.g. aSAvYreNzVEkrWg5Gdcvg). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
options.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

options.name: fields
options.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve (e.g. _submission_time,_submitted_by). If left blank, all fields are retrieved.

options.name: version
options.description: Attachment size to retrieve, if multiple versions are available

options.name: selectMask
options.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as multiselect fields, i.e. parsed as arrays.

options.name: numberMask
options.description: Comma-separated list of wildcard-style selectors for fields that should be treated as numbers

options.name: reformat
options.description: Whether to apply some reformatting to the submission data, such as parsing GeoJSON coordinates

options.name: sort
options.description: Sort predicates, in MongoDB JSON format (e.g. {"_submission_time":1})

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filters.name: filters

options.name: filter
options.description: A text search query based on form data - e.g. "owner__username:meg AND name__icontains:quixotic" - see docs for more details

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

hookId.name: hookId
hookId.description: Hook ID (starts with h, e.g. hVehywQ2oXPYGHJHKtqth4)
hookId.ai_hint: Hook ID (starts with h, e.g. hVehywQ2oXPYGHJHKtqth4)

logId.name: logId
logId.description: Hook log ID (starts with hl, e.g. hlSbGKaUKzTVNoWEVMYbLHe)
logId.ai_hint: Hook log ID (starts with hl, e.g. hlSbGKaUKzTVNoWEVMYbLHe)

status.name: status
status.description: Only retrieve logs with a specific status
status.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Minimum date for the hook log to retrieve
startDate.ai_hint: Minimum date for the hook log to retrieve

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: Maximum date for the hook log to retrieve
endDate.ai_hint: Maximum date for the hook log to retrieve

validationStatus.name: validationStatus
validationStatus.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsonNotice.displayName: See Formhub API docs to creating filters, using the MongoDB JSON format - e.g. {"_submission_time":{"$lt":"2021-10-01T01:02:03"}}
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: Uid of the file (should start with "af" e.g. "afQoJxA4kmKEXVpkH6SYbhb"
fileId.ai_hint: Uid of the file (should start with "af" e.g. "afQoJxA4kmKEXVpkH6SYbhb"

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property containing the file to upload. Supported types: image, audio, video, csv, xml, zip.
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property containing the file to upload. Supported types: image, audio, video, csv, xml, zip.

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download the file content into a binary property

fileMode.name: fileMode
fileMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fileUrl.name: fileUrl
fileUrl.description: HTTP(s) link to the file to upload
fileUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'form' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation IN ["get", "redeploy"] THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'form' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'hook' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation IN ["get", "retryOne", "retryAll", "getLogs", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation IN ["get", "retryOne", "retryAll", "getLogs"] THEN SHOW parameter 'hookId'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'retryOne' THEN SHOW parameter 'logId'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'getLogs' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'getLogs' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDate'
IF resource == 'hook' AND operation == 'getLogs' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDate'
IF resource == 'submission' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation IN ["get", "delete", "getValidation", "setValidation", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation IN ["get", "delete", "getValidation", "setValidation"] THEN SHOW parameter 'submissionId'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'setValidation' THEN SHOW parameter 'validationStatus'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterType'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'getAll' AND filterType == 'json' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonNotice'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation == 'getAll' AND filterType == 'json' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterJson'
IF resource == 'submission' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryNamingScheme'
IF download == True AND binaryNamingScheme == 'sequence' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName'
IF download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'version'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'formId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileMode'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'create' AND fileMode == 'binary' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'create' AND fileMode == 'url' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileUrl'
